text.198_Daf, 0_Line: A PRIVATE PATH … FOUR CUBITS. A Tanna taught: Others say [that the path must be of such a width] as an ass with its load may be able to pass. R. Huna said: The halachah is according to the Others. The Judges of the Exile23  say: [The width is to be] two cubits24  and a half; and R.
